long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Syn up with your preferred streaming platform like Netflix, YouTube, HBO Max, Disney Plus, and many more. Have the Blast by Downloading the Teleparty extension on your browser. So, Live Video Chat and share all the fun with your loved ones on one platform.

Explore Teleparty: Anywhere and anytime

Teleparty Extension

Teleparty extension is a wonderful tool where you can watch all your favorite shows and movies on one platform. Here you can plan your virtual date night with your special one and send emojis while streaming.

 How to Install the Teleparty Extension


1) Visit the Chrome Web Store and search for the extension or you can directly go to the Teleparty extension website.
2) Now click on Add to Chrome to install Teleparty.
3) Pin the Teleparty icon to your browser toolbar for easy access.

 How to Use the Extension

1) Go to your most preferred streaming platform like Netflix, YouTube, HBO Max, and many more. Remember you must have a valid subscription.
2) Now open the video that you want to stream and start a party by clicking on the Teleparty icon and selecting Start the party.
3) You can invite your friends and share the URL link with them.
4) Now you can watch synchronized shows and movies and the best part is you can chat and video call your friends while streaming.

Features of the Teleparty Extension

You can invite as many as people.
 It is compatible with various supported platforms like Netflix, YouTube, HBO Max, Disney Hotstar, and many more.
You can discuss your favourite scene, via chat and video call features.
Here you can have HD-quality video.
With our customization option, you can choose your user icon and nickname.
You can share the URL with your friends to watch a party.
You will also have the party control watch, you can also host and control the party at the same time.
It is downloadable from anywhere in the world.

       Benefits of Installing Teleparty Extension

You can connect with your friends and watch together no matter where you are.
Here you can explore new series, shows, and movies on different streaming platforms.
It is very flexible like it is up to you whether you want to join or leave a watch party.
You will have multiple shows to plan with your friends and family.
Donâ€™t worry about the long distance it will connect you with your loved ones. You will feel like they are next to you and streaming your favorite shows.

This is the best extension where you can experience the best of synchronized streaming with Teleparty. It is very easy to download and install on your browser. It is the best way to connect with your long-distance friends. Thousands of users are watching their favorite series in the Teleparty extension. So what are you waiting for? Just download the extension and start watch party now.
